remarks: The restriction of the category of (unital) rings to the set of field homomorphisms is a category, the "category of fields".  (Contributed by AV, 20-Feb-2020.)
statement:
drhmsubc.c $e |- C = ( U i^i DivRing ) $.
drhmsubc.j $e |- J = ( r e. C , s e. C |-> ( r RingHom s ) ) $.
fldhmsubc.d $e |- D = ( U i^i Field ) $.
fldhmsubc.f $e |- F = ( r e. D , s e. D |-> ( r RingHom s ) ) $.
fldcat $p |- ( U e. V -> ( ( RingCat ` U ) |`cat F ) e. Cat ) $.
$d C r s $.
$d D r s $.
$d U r s $.
$d V r s $.
